ti:translation.ti:label: The Oracle at Delphi no Longer Given in Verse
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. V. Babbitt, Frank Cole, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1936 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Wherefore the Pythian Priestess now Ceases to Deliver her Oracles in Verse
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. III. Goodwin, William W., editor; Philips, John, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τοῦ μὴ χρᾶν ἔμμετρα νῦν τὴν Πυθίαν
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol II. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner. 1891.
